Alan Mo

Marketing/Social Chair

Alan is pursuing a 5-year BSMS in Software Development and Computer Science. His career goals include Computational Neurobiology, aiming to use technology for advancements in medicine. In his free time, Alan enjoys swimming, music, and playing with tech.
